summary:
This mod is add \"Ralof Ozisan\" in Riverwood Sleeping Giant Inn.
He has been dead drunk.

-v1.1
? First, He did not show up to the Riverwood Sleeping Giant Inn at all. 
? some fix.
-v1.2
?His motion changed to female.
  He is Transsexual in Tamliel.
  Normal motion version is optional.
v1.3-
He decided study
descriptionHtml:
This mod is add \"Ralof Ozisan\" in Riverwood Sleeping Giant Inn.
He has been dead drunk.

-v1.1
? First, He did not show up to the Riverwood Sleeping Giant Inn at all. 
? some fix.
-v1.2
?His motion changed to female.
  He is Transsexual in Tamliel.
  Normal motion version is optional.
v1.3-
He decided study the magic to fight empire force!!
He have some spell book and many Skooma. Please let learn the favorite magic yourself.

Installation:
-------------
Place the esp file into your data folder. 
-If you have already hire, Save game after remove the old version and Please go to see him again. 

Reccomend mod:
:UFO : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037/?
:Santa Clause Wear : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2216/?

Sample Video : http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xIT_l4pmquU

If you like it, please use it!!
author: SunoharaHermione

files.name: Ralof Ozisan Follower - Transsexual
files.changelogHtml: His motion changed to female. He is Transsexual in Tamliel.
